short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures and downloads resources from web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tool for capturing and saving data from web pages:
* Open extension popup and click "Start Capturing"
* Open page you want to capture
* A list of resources will be presented with download icon

* v2.1 UI improved: sorting, filtering
* v2.0 switched to using debugger api
* v1.0 initial release
